import React,{useState} from 'react' function App (){ const[name,setName]=useState("") const[select,setSelect]=useState("") const[tnc,setTnc]=useState(false) function getdata(e){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(name,select,tnc) } return (
setName(e.target.value)}/>



setTnc(e.target.checked)}/>Accept all terms & condtions

name selection t&c
) } export default App
